name: AVMutableAssetDownloadStorageManagementPolicy
desc: A mutable object that you use to create a new storage management policy.

items.name: var expirationDate: Date
items.desc: The expiration date for an asset.

items.name: var priority: AVAssetDownloadedAssetEvictionPriority
items.desc: The eviction priority for a downloaded asset.

items.name: struct AVAssetDownloadedAssetEvictionPriority
items.desc: Constants that define eviction priorities for a storage management policy.
